question: The headquarters of the African Union is located in which city?
explanation: The headquarters of the African Union is located in Addis Ababa, the capital city of Ethiopia. The African Union is a regional organization of 55 African countries, announced in 1999 as per the Sirte Declaration proclaimed in Libya. The Union was found in the year 2002. The main objective of the African Union is to achieve greater unity, cohesion, and solidarity, political and socio-economic integration of the African countries.
